page.title: 02Lamberhurst Village Centre
page.content: The{A21}is the main road between London and Hastings so a lot of traffic passes through{Lamberhurst. The A21 seems always to be in need of repairs which cause a lot of congestion. At the beginning and end of school we have to have a lollipop lady to help us cross the road safely. Sometimes it is difficult to concentrate on our work because the heavy lorries thunder as they pass, shaking the school. {The village centre}has seven shops. Some of the houses are very old but modern developments have been added. There are also five public houses, which serve travellers on the main road as well as the locals. There is a triangular shaped piece of grass where the{High Street}meets the A21. There are usually lots of parked cars.
